name: ADOPT CONFIDENTLY - technologies and practices that have proved their merit for general use.
ADOPT CAUTIOUSLY - widespread industry acceptance but limited internal experience; consider adopting in your project.
ASSESS - technologies and practices youâ€™ll probably want to know about but not necessarily adopt unless the fit is obvious and you can accept the risk.
WATCH - have industry buzz but may not be ready for prime time.
RECONSIDER - problematic or of limited applicability; where reasonable, avoid and even replace.
